00001 package modelManagement.simulink;
00002 
00003 import java.util.ArrayList;
00004 import java.util.Collection;
00005 
00006 import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList;
00007 
00008 import Simulink.Port;
00009 import Simulink.ProtoObject;
00010 import Simulink.System;
00011 
00012 public abstract class PortProcessor {
00013 
00014         ArrayList<ProtoObject> list = new ArrayList<ProtoObject>();
00015         System theSystem;
00016         SystemLayouter layouter;
00017 
00018         protected void init(System aSystem, SystemLayouter layouter) {
00019                 this.theSystem = aSystem;
00020                 this.layouter = layouter;
00021         }
00022 
00023         protected <P extends Port> Collection<? extends ProtoObject> process(EList<P> ports) {
00024                 for (P port : ports ) {
00025                         processPort( port );
00026                         list.add( port );
00027                 }
00028                 return list;
00029         }
00030 
00031         protected <P extends Port> void processPort(P port) {
00032                 computeInstanceName( port );
00033                 computePosition( port );
00034         }
00035 
00036         protected void computePosition(Port port) {
00037                 String position = port.getPosition(); 
00038                 if ( (position==null) || (position.isEmpty()) ) {
00039                         position = layouter.nextPort();
00040                         port.setPosition(position);
00041                 }
00042         }
00043         
00044         protected <P extends Port> void computeInstanceName(Port port) {
00045                 String parentName = this.getParentName( port );
00046                 this.addTypeSuffixIfNeeded( port );
00047                 String simuName = parentName + '/' + port.getName();
00048                 port.setSimulinkName(simuName); 
00049 }
00050 
00051         protected abstract void addTypeSuffixIfNeeded(Port port);
00052         
00053         protected String getParentName(Port port) {
00054                 return "subClass responsibility";
00055         }
00056 }
